alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 4:34PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Fremont, north central Jefferson, northwestern Madison and southeastern Clark Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 434 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Island Park Reservoir to near Hamer. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ashton, Marysville, Parker, Hamer, Egin, Ponds Lodge, St Anthony, Chester, Last Chance, Island Park Reservoir, Ashton Reservoir, Warm River, Harriman State Park, Saint Anthony Sand Dunes, Ashton Hill and Mesa Falls State Park. Those attending the Fremont County Fair are in the path of these storms and should prepare for IMMINENT DANGEROUS WEATHER CONDITIONS. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Beaverhead, Lemhi Highlands; Centennial Mountains, Island Park
